医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新型合成肺表面活性剂可能彻底改变早产儿的治疗科学家们开发出了一种新的肺表面活性剂，它是合成生产的，而不是依赖于使用动物组织。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/New-synthetic-lung-surfactant-could-revolutionize-treatment-for-premature-babies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/New-synthetic-lung-surfactant-could-revolutionize-treatment-for-premature-babies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd5d7fa3-67c9-41fe-bbb0-c62aac13b191 Mon, 25 Mar 2024 22:18:15 -0400 New synthetic lung surfactant could revolutionize treatment for premature babies
研究探讨了 COVID-19 期间儿科医疗保健中断的情况本研究探讨了儿科医疗保健在 COVID-19 大流行期间以及由于该大流行而受到中断的程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Study-explores-pediatric-healthcare-interruptions-amid-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Study-explores-pediatric-healthcare-interruptions-amid-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3dfec62b-52ba-4593-9224-42646d6689eb Mon, 25 Mar 2024 22:08:05 -0400 Study explores pediatric healthcare interruptions amid COVID-19
了解父亲对儿子性准备和安全套使用的看法这项研究的目的是更深入地探讨父亲对青春期儿子是否做好性交准备的看法，以及他们为儿子提供正确、一致使用安全套指导的可能性之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Understanding-fathers-views-on-sons- Sex-preparedness-and-condom-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Understanding-fathers-views-on-sons- Sex-preparedness-and-condom-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=194579ad-6b40-4903-8d3c-409790e08281 Mon, 25 Mar 2024 22:02:39 -0400 Understanding fathers' views on sons' sexual preparedness and condom use
新方法预测儿童败血症和器官衰竭昆士兰大学的研究人员开发了一种方法来预测儿童是否可能患上败血症并发生器官衰竭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/New-method-predicts-sepsis-and-organ-failure-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/New-method-predicts-sepsis-and-organ-failure-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b00a9e7-26f5-4dff-abef-7fc8098198fd Mon, 25 Mar 2024 21:50:00 -0400 New method predicts sepsis and organ failure in children
利用癌症疗法对抗结核病关于结核病，癌症能让我们学到什么？这是米纳尔·达塔（Meenal Datta）从研究生时期起就一直在追求的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Leveraging-cancer-therapies-to-combat-tuberculosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Leveraging-cancer-therapies-to-combat-tuberculosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4348bc3-842a-400c-9117-7ad361a34622 Mon, 25 Mar 2024 21:40:30 -0400 Leveraging cancer therapies to combat tuberculosis
如果及早治疗并采用高效疗法，多发性硬化症儿童的预后会更好一项全球规模最大的开创性研究发现，患有多发性硬化症 (MS) 的儿童如果及早接受治疗并采用与成人相同的高效疗法，可以获得更好的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Children-with-multiple-sclerosis-have-better-outcomes-if-treatment-early-and-with-high-efficacy-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Children-with-multiple-sclerosis-have-better-outcomes-if-treatment-early-and-with-high-efficacy-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46a290a9-560e-4550-a7a3-9e6221cc52b8 Mon, 25 Mar 2024 21:27:49 -0400 Children with multiple sclerosis have better outcomes if treated early and with high-efficacy therapies
夜间大量暴露在室外光线可能是脑血管疾病的危险因素根据美国中风协会同行评审科学杂志《中风》今天发表的研究，人们在夜间持续暴露在明亮的人造光下可能会增加患上影响大脑血液流动和中风的风险。美国心脏协会的一个部门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/High-exposure-to-outdoor-nighttime-light-may-be-a-risk-factor-for-cerebroangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/High-exposure-to-outdoor-nighttime-light-may-be-a-risk-factor-for-cerebroangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6764365-1a93-4d71-8111-d7fecfe16d0e Mon, 25 Mar 2024 21:19:00 -0400 High exposure to outdoor nighttime light may be a risk factor for cerebrovascular disease
评论解释了地中海饮食中鲜为人知但至关重要的组成部分全面概述地中海饮食中未被充分认识的成分，揭示了经过深入研究的水果、蔬菜和橄榄油之外的新饮食因素，包括鸡蛋、乳制品、坚果、种子、香草、香料和红酒，以便更好地定义并从中受益这种饮食。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Review-explains-lesser-known-yet-vital-components-of-the-Mediterranean-diet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Review-explains-lesser-known-yet-vital-components-of-the-Mediterranean-diet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd2d895a-aa93-4970-9a9e-59d9e6e7d529 Mon, 25 Mar 2024 21:16:00 -0400 Review explains lesser-known yet vital components of the Mediterranean diet
Venetoclax 组合为无法治愈的多发性骨髓瘤开辟了新的治疗途径RCSI 研究发现，目前批准用于治疗白血病的药物 Venetoclax 与另一种药物联合使用时，对多发性骨髓瘤患者有好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Venetoclax-combo-opens-new-treatment-path-for-incurable-multiple-myeloma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Venetoclax-combo-opens-new-treatment-path-for-incurable-multiple-myeloma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1635f0f-5d5a-4d60-b262-b51d11307f61 Mon, 25 Mar 2024 21:09:00 -0400 Venetoclax combo opens new treatment path for incurable multiple myeloma
澳大利亚国立大学科学家发现导致银屑病和银屑病关节炎的基因突变澳大利亚国立大学 (ANU) 的科学家发现，一种基因突变导致牛皮癣——一种慢性炎症性皮肤病，会导致患者全身出现红色、鳞状和发痒的斑块。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/ANU-scientists-uncover-gene-mutation-driven-psoriasis-and-psoriatic-arthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/ANU-scientists-uncover-gene-mutation-driven-psoriasis-and-psoriatic-arthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7fd0f35-8ba2-4655-922e-19c93220ade7 Mon, 25 Mar 2024 15:38:40 -0400 ANU scientists uncover gene mutation driving psoriasis and psoriatic arthritis
